messages.content:
Convert this following IPv4 configuration into IPv4 and IPv6 (merged) configuration using a dual-stack strategy. IPv4 configuration:```interface ve 453 
 ip access-group INET-ONLY in 
 ip address 10.65.240.1 255.255.248.0 
 ip helper-address 1 10.10.10.241 
 ip helper-address 2 10.10.10.242``` 
 IPv6 block: ```2404:a640:65:453::/64``` 
 Please return as a code block and only the converted configuration (no explanation text)

```interface ve 453 
 ip access-group INET-ONLY in 
 ip address 10.65.240.1 255.255.248.0 
 ip helper-address 1 10.10.10.241 
 ip helper-address 2 10.10.10.242 
 ipv6 address 2404:a640:65:453::1/64```
